heroSubtitle: A 2‑minute quiz that turns how you’ve been feeling into a Glowtype card.
heroHint: No login, no diagnosis, just something light to play with.
heroCardSubtitle: Answer a few questions and get a shareable Glowtype card at the end.
step1Title: Pick what feels most like you
step1Body: Short everyday situations, not heavy questions.
step2Body: Your choices sketch a soft picture of your emotional orbit.
step3Body: A little card you can keep or screenshot.
whatItIsBody: Glowtype is a playful reflection tool to give words to your inner world, not a label or medical advice.
safetyPreviewBody: You can use Glowtype without logging in. No ads, no streaks, no pressure.
safetyPreviewExtra: If anything feels too much, you can always just close the tab.
